subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter had 28 points, 5 assists and 2 steals and the Liberty clinched a playoff spot with its eighth consecutive win, a 107-69 victory Saturday night against the Phoenix Mercury.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter had 28 points, 5 assists and 2 steals and the Liberty clinched a playoff spot with its eighth consecutive win, a 107-69 victory Saturday night against the Phoenix Mercury.
